dialogues.name: LK_welcome_01
dialogues.text:
Time to customise your very
own F1 Car. Get ready to deck
out your very own livery and
make unique to your style.

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_02
dialogues.text: To take a look at your masterpiece, tap and drag the screen to move the camera around, and pinch to zoom in and out.

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_05
dialogues.text: Let’s get started then. Choose your pattern.

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_08
dialogues.text: Looking good already, now get colourful.

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_11
dialogues.text: Get personal, add your own tag.

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_17
dialogues.text: Your F1 design is being sprayed on...

dialogues.name: LK_tutorial_19
dialogues.text:
Time to see your custom design
in WebAR. Get ready to see your
work of art up close and
personal in the real world.

dialogues.name: LK_turndevice_02
dialogues.text:
This experience requires your device to be held portrait,
please turn to proceed.

dialogues.name: LK_info_prepping
dialogues.text: We’re just prepping the garage for you now...

dialogues.name: LK_final_01
dialogues.text: If you’re happy, hit next, if you want to change, hit back to amend your design.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_cameraRequest_1
dialogues.text: To access the augmented reality experience, you must allow camera access for it to work.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_cameraError_1
dialogues.text: There's a error with your camera, try refreshing the page.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_findMarker_2
dialogues.text: Scan image target to see your F1 car design in front of you.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_findMarker_3
dialogues.text: Scan image target to see your F1 helmet design in front of you.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_explore_02
dialogues.text: Admire your design from every angle. Walk around the car and see it come to life.

dialogues.name: LK_AR_share_02
dialogues.text: Tap the camera button to snap a pic. Hold to create a video. Share on socials.
